text_logic_form: Find the area of the pentagon $ANCDB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the pentagon $ANCDB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AN$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $CN$ is $15$ units.
The line $DB$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
The line $BC$ is perpendicular to the line $NC$.
The line $AN$ is perpendicular to the line $NC$.
line_instances: There are lines $AD$, $AN$, $BC$, $DB$, and $NC$, forming the pentagon $ANCDB$.
